titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7690

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Sept: 5 1862.
Hon:
D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: of State --
I have issd. & delivered the following Commissions viz:

Frederick Slater Captain
Robert Terrill -- 1st Lieut:
Edward H. Green 2d Lieut:
Zeiah Teaney 2d Lieut: } dated Sep. 4 1862

Jacob Cozatt Captain
Samuel P. Debaun 1st Lieut:
Wm H. Norton 2d Lieut: } dated Sep. 3. 1862

James A. Rosseau
John Rue Wheat
Geo. R. Price
Peter S. Ruch
Levi Moore
Weeden S. Yates } all 2d. Lieuts: & dated Sep: 5. 1862

Wm T. Epperson
John C. Green
James Wright
James T. Bramlette } all 2nd Lieuts: & dated 5 Sep: 1862

Very Resp.y
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl. Ken. Vols:
